name: Kinetic Card
description: A blank card containing pure kinetic energy. Useless on its own, but serves as the fundamental fuel for synthesizing powerful exercise protocols.

name: Aetheric Resonator
description: A single-use device that resonates with the Aether. Activating it captures the narrative essence of a legendary hero, crystallizing it into an 'Echo Crystal'.

name: Echo Crystal: Sea-Storm Scoundrel
description: This crystal holds the narrative of a fearless pirate who danced through tempests. Its essence is one of unpredictable agility and relentless rhythm.

name: Echo Crystal: The Aegis Vanguard
description: This crystal holds the story of an armored protector who was a living fortress. Its essence is one of unyielding upper-body strength and fortitude.

name: Kraken's Coil Rope Card Lv. 1
description: Channel the Sea-Storm Scoundrel! Feel the chaotic rhythm of the ocean as you master this artifact born from the tempest. (Exercise: Skipping - 100 Reps)

name: Aegis Gauntlets Card Lv. 1
description: Channel the Aegis Vanguard! Feel the unyielding power in your arms, like a living fortress holding back an onslaught. (Exercise: Push-up - 5 Reps)
